title: Key Account Managers (Area Manager)
jobDescription:
1. To meet doctors/stakeholders in Mumbai/Thane/Navi Mumbai and detail about Lupins Neuro rehab center, communicate the patients benefits to doctors/hospitals through company provided detailing tools/promotional material and ensure foot fall of patients to the neuro rehab center so that the benefits of such a center is passed on to maximum number of patients in Mumbai area.
2. To meet the customers (list will be provided by the company) at a pre-defined frequency.
3. To generate awareness about Lupins neuro rehab centre and benefits of rehab therapy at doctors/hospitals/nursing homes/other health care centers by meeting the stakeholders in person and conducting company guided awareness programs.
4. Work closely with Lupins rehab team and implement the strategies effectively.
5. Identify the doctors / hospitals / patients / caregivers needs and share with the rehab leadership team. Share constructive and structured market feedback with the leadership team on a pre-defined frequency.
6. Ensure targeted patient foot fall at Lupin s neuro rehab centre.

title: Android HMI Engineer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Vimerse Infotech India Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Qualification: Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science / Electrical Engineering or a related discipline

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • As a senior-level software engineer, you will coordinate and implement both Android
  • Automotive OS platform,
  • features as well as Customer-facing features of our connected, embedded Infotainment System.
  • Candidate should have sound knowledge of Android System and Framework.
  • Responsible from requirement analysis till realization of the functionality in Android
  • Automotive domain.
  • Responsible to develop different modules/components in Android Automotive System
  • Is responsible for multiple component ownership for Android Automotive System
  • Delivery of the software for software Integration
  • Ensure the implementation of defined test strategies and document the achieved results.
  • Ensure pre-integration testing and verification for the functional area and its features.
  • Ensure traceability, consistency of requirements and feature maturity
  • Defect triaging and resolution
  • Work with other domains for the resolution of dependencies on features and defects
  • Mentor the less experienced team members to guide and assist them in completing their tasks on time.
  • 8+ years of working experience in modifying Android framework components, system services,
  • and the Android SDK
  • Good understanding of Android Automotive System and Car Framework
  • Should have very good understanding of different Android Components : Services, Broadcast
  • Receivers, Content Providers, Treble Architecture
  • Proficiency Java, or Kotlin and Object-Oriented Programming
  • Expertise and working knowledge in one or more domain are mandatory in IVI SYSTEM
  • vConnectivity (Wifi or Bluetooth or NFC etc), vMultimedia (Audio or Video ), vVPA (Virtual
  • Personal Assistant: Alexa, Google etc), vEVS (Exterior View System Camera for IVI), vCluster
  • rendering, vADAS
  • vNavigation, vAutomotive HMI / vVehicle HAL
  • Solid understanding of Android best practices and mechanisms for ensuring robustness and
  • stability of the system
  • Hands on experience writing UNIT test cases for developed Android Modules
  • Exposure to Android build system is required
  • Knowledge on any Git, Gtest and SVN and Tortoise configuration Tools.
  • Strong communication skills and Good English skills (writing, documenting, conversation)
  • Android Porting/Upgrading Experience
  • Ensure traceability, consistency of requirements and feature maturity
  • Good understanding and working knowledge of CDD and GAS documents
  • Exposure in Google Compliance Testing (CTS,VTS, STS,ACTS etc)
  • Good knowledge of Android Middleware (Drivers, HAL, Libraries, Framework etc)
  • Knowledge on Testing Tools like CANOe will be an added advantage
  • Exposure to Android tools and debugging techniques

title: Professional Services Consultant (Wireless)
jobDescription:
• We are setting up a competence centre set up in Kalwa, Navi Mumbai. We are a supplier of network solutions for the industry and our target is to provide expert technical services for our customers and partners.

Responsibility:
  • Performing Site surveys and analysis of clients existing network setup. Validate the performance, quality, and reliability of the RF link.
  • Network Solution design (HLD/LLD) and consulting for OT customers using siemens developed wireless products for IT/OT Integration.
  • Implement WLANs and other wireless networks.
  • Write manuals and document current network procedures.
  • Devise and support radio frequencies (RF) link performance, reliability, and quality.
  • Handhold other in-house engineers to train them on wireless technologies.

Skills and Competencies (required):
  • Bachelor s Degree/Masters degree in Telecommunication or Electronics or Comp-IT.
  • 5-8 years experience as wireless network engineer/consultant for larger networks.
  • Working experiance with Wireless and wired solutions and tools such as Ekahau Spectrum analyzer.
  • Strong foundation and in-depth technical knowledge in wireless and wired network domain.
  • Have extensive knowledge of routing and switching.
  • Basic project management skills essential to track milestones and validate project progress
  • The ability to work effectively with internal and external clients, management, staff members, and consultants.
  • Willingness to learn Automation Solutions and Network and Security standards and best practices for the Industrial environment.
  • Good business communication skills.
  • Willingness to travel (up to 50%)
Certificaions: wirelss certifications such as CCNA/ CCNP Wireless, Aruba, etc are mandatory.
